Text.Value: I'd never have struck at a fellow servant of Lady Shar, had I realised.
You - why did you have to keep prying? Why couldn't you just leave?!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looks up from his hands to the player, angry
EditorData.NodeContext: Angry, irrational outburst. Looks up at the player on 'you'.

Text.Value: But you ruined it. Trespassed. Spoiled our - my - secret. Now you'll rot in the dark.

EditorData.NodeContext: Furious. Still mixed up, referring to himself in plural then correcting. Turns hostile immediately afterwards

Text.Value: No, there's no others. We - I - kept the faith, alone. You will not steal the Dark Lady's favour from me!

EditorData.NodeContext: Furious. Still mixed up, referring to himself in plural then correcting.

Text.Value: You should have just ran from him. Now you'll die before me instead.
I'm glad I did it. The world's better off without Shar worshippers skulking about.
Lyrthindor - last Dark Justiciar. I kept watch over Lady Shar's temple. Kept the faith alive, after all the others were killed.
My side is dead - just piles of old bones lying in the dark. You're nothing to me!
Wait - I'm a child of Lady Shar, just like you. We're on the same side.
Oh yes there is. All these years, I kept the Dark Lady's faith alive, against the odds, against the devil.
These hands... too big. Where are the others? Where's the rest of me?!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looking at his own hands in confusion
EditorData.NodeContext: Groan of pain followed by anger and confusion as he looks down at his own hands in disbelief

Text.Value: The world will never be rid of us - we are everywhere. But you...? Your miserable tale ends right now.
You mean Yurgir? I'm telling you, I didn't know. I was just trying to humour him so he'd let me go.
I'm telling you, I didn't know. There's no need for violence - more violence.
Hold on - who are you?
That devil. You should have just ran from him. Now you'll die before me instead.
I didn't know. There's no need for violence - more violence.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
A rat transforms into an elf. Its hisses and squeaks morph into the elf's cry of pain as he returns to his true form.

Keep the camera on the player while they react to the transformation
EditorData.SFXTags: [WI][GUS-210545] Rat's cries/squeks/hiss as he start to morph, also need audio support for transformation
EditorData.VFXTags: [WI][GUS-210545] transformation VFX/Wildshape VFX from Rat to Speaker

Text.Value: Such ignorance is unworthy of the Nightsinger's followers. Her church will be stronger once you are dead.
Wait - I didn't realise. There's no quarrel between us.
Wrong - you forced my hand. Now I'll make you into an offering for Lady Shar.
I'm sorry. What more can be said?
I didn't know. I was just trying to humour Yurgir so he'd let me go.
Nothing. You had your chance to talk - now you die.
Stand down. I completed the rites of this place. I am a Dark Justiciar, same as you.
Attack.

Synopsis: After killing the final rat during the Ultimatum stage, one of the final rats returns to its humanoid form as Lyrthindor,  the Last Justiciar. He's furious that the player has blown his cover, and quickly turns hostile.
